channel.title: Christmas talker v2.0 - Got me free full rune

item.title: Christmas talker v2.0 - Got me free full rune
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

move mouse smooth is detectable,use mmouse,so is sendkeys, ActivateClient doesnt need to be in a procedure, it goes in the main loop.

Just to make room put the sendkeys VB into

Sendkeys(something) + Chr(13))

And delete them sendkeysvb

For the login… so easy
Copy mine,

procedure DeclarePlayers;
 Begin                         {dont touch this!}
    HowManyPlayers := 1;
    NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);    // Sets the Players Array Length;
    CurrentPlayer := 0;                 // CurrentPlayer = Array Index
                             {just touch this!}
    Players[0].Name := '';        //Username
    Players[0].Pass := '';           //Password
    Players[0].Nick := '';             //3 or 4 letters username
    Players[0].Loc := '';                  //Dont touch this
    Players[0].Active := True;
end;

Delete that login stuff then put

Loginplayer;

in the talk procedure,in the very begining after the begin.

Also put clear debug in the main loop

I fixed the whole script for you, here it is, (SRL VERSION)

program ChristmasTalker;
{.include srl/srl.scar}

var
Howmanytimes :integer;

const
howmany=1; //how many times do you wanna do it

procedure Talk;
begin
typesend('white:Merry christmas!' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
typesend('red:Ho Ho Ho!' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
typesend('white:What you doing here?' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
typesend('red:Its christmas evening!!' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
typesend('white:Ho Ho Ho! Merry Christmas' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
typesend('red:Have a nice evening!' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
typesend('white:Ho Ho Ho! Merry Christmas' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
typesend('white:Greetings from System79' + Chr(13))
howmanytimes:= howmany+1
writeln('Christmas by System79');
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
Cleardebug;
Repeat
Talk;
Until(howmanytimes=howmany)
end.

(NO SRL)

program ChristmasTalker;

var
Howmanytimes :integer;

const
howmany=1; //how many times do you wanna do it

procedure Talk;
begin
sendkeys('white:Merry christmas!' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
sendkeys('red:Ho Ho Ho!' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
sendkeys('white:What you doing here?' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
sendkeys('red:Its christmas evening!!' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
sendkeys('white:Ho Ho Ho! Merry Christmas' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
sendkeys('red:Have a nice evening!' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
sendkeys('white:Ho Ho Ho! Merry Christmas' + Chr(13))
Wait(1000);
sendkeys('white:Greetings from System79' + Chr(13))
howmanytimes:= howmany+1
writeln('Christmas by System79');
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
Cleardebug;
Repeat
Talk;
Until(howmanytimes=howmany)
end.

Clickmouse is very detectable. Try using holdmouse, then releasemouse. Pretty good though.

item.title: Christmas talker v2.0 - Got me free full rune
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

This script is pretty handy if you want full rune… someone just gave me ask present and some lvl 29 gave me his full mith <3

[CODE]program ChristmasTalker; //put login; in the main loop to set auto-login
procedure login;
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(468, 291)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(100);
Sendkeys(‘username’)//if using login put username here
wait(100);
MoveMouseSmooth(373, 274)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(100);
SendKeys(‘password’)//if using login put password here
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(331, 320)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(600);
end;
procedure Activate;
begin
ActivateClient;
end;
procedure Talk;
begin
SendKeys(‘white:Merry christmas!’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(100);
SendKeys(‘red:Ho Ho Ho!’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(100);
SendKeys(‘white:What you doing here?’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(100);
SendKeys(‘red:Its christmas evening!!’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(100);
SendKeys(‘white:Ho Ho Ho! Merry Christmas’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(100);
SendKeys(‘red:Have a nice evening!’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(100);
SendKeys(‘white:Ho Ho Ho! Merry Christmas’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(100);
SendKeys(‘red:Merry christmas people!!’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);
Wait(100);
SendKeys(‘white:Greetings from System79’);
SendKeysVB(’{ENTER}’, True);

writeln(‘Christmas by System79’);
end;

begin
Activate;
Repeat
Talk;
Until(IsFKeyDown(12))

end.[/CODE]
im massively using this script in w1… hope to see some other people use it in the next hours…
